input.sentences: there was a charity event and they had animals .
after viewing the animals they played a balloon game .
after that they had fun with bubbles .
after that the man sing for them and all the kids started to dance .
after that the panda man showed up and gave all the kids a hug .
output.sentences: Today there was a charity event to raise money for endangered animals.
After viewing some of the animals the kids got to play a game.
They also had some fun with bubbles.
To raise more money they started a talent show and got some of the kids to sing.
The panda was the clearly the most popular thing at the event proven by all the kids that gave it a hug.
